description: This file appears to be a C header (.h) file defining constants, includes, external variables, and function prototypes related to system events handling within the CcspCMAgent component of the project. It primarily provides interface declarations and macro definitions, and contains licensing information, but no implementation details or class definitions.

methods.name: commonSyseventSet
methods.description: Sets a system event key-value pair.

methods.name: commonSyseventGet
methods.description: Retrieves the value for a given system event key.

methods.name: commonSyseventClose
methods.description: Closes the system event file descriptor.
